short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that redirects pages on 'www.reddit.com' to 'old.reddit.com'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that redirects pages on 'www.reddit.com' to 'old.reddit.com'. Perfect for people who prefer how Reddit looked pre-2018.
